title: regarding the xayah and rakan icon
body: so i noticed lots of people have received there icon's for playing either xayah or rakan with the other on there team a couple times i have yet to receive mine so i was wondering if its some kind of bug . I am  sure i have met the requirements

replies.body: They usually roll them out in waves. The redemption period is up to two weeks after the earning period ended, so you could get them tomorrow or it could well be another week.
